description.value:
A horn of the sun aurochs grants a +2 item bonus to Performance checks when played as an instrument.

Activate Interact 2

Frequency once per day

Effect The horn is clearly audible for hundreds of feet, but within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20], the sound causes agony in those who wish harm upon the user; the horn also sheds bright light in that area and dim light to the next 20 feet. Enemies of the user in this area take [[/r {7d6}[sonic]]]{7d6 sonic damage} and [[/r {7d6}[good]]]{7d6 good damage} (basic @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30] save). Creatures that are specifically vulnerable to sunlight are also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 1} if they fail this save or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure. This activation also attempts to counteract any darkness or sleep effects in the area ([[/r 1d20+23 #Counteract]]{+23} counteract check).
